weapon.name: Close Quarters
weapon.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

weapon.name: Headshot Booster
weapon.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage with headshots.

weapon.name: Hollow Point Ward
weapon.description: When you are above 60% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

weapon.name: Active Reload
weapon.description: While reloading, pressing reload during the highlited portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

weapon.name: Berserker
weapon.description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

weapon.name: Kinetic Dash
weapon.description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

weapon.name: Long Range
weapon.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

weapon.name: Melee Damage
weapon.description: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reload your weapon instantly or give you up to +100% bonus ammo. Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.

weapon.name: Mystic Shot
weapon.description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

weapon.name: Slowing Bullets
weapon.description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow.

weapon.name: Soul Shredder Bullets
weapon.description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

weapon.name: Burst Fire
weapon.description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hit an enemy hero.

weapon.name: Escalating Resilience
weapon.description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only gain one stack.

weapon.name: Headhunter
weapon.description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus movement speed.

weapon.name: Hunter's Aura
weapon.description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

weapon.name: Intensifying Magazine
weapon.description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

weapon.name: Point Blank
weapon.description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

weapon.name: Pristine Emblem
weapon.description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

weapon.name: Sharpshooter
weapon.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

weapon.name: Spellslinger Headshots
weapon.description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them. Landing a headshot increases your total Spirit Amp against them.

weapon.name: Tesla Bullets
weapon.description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

weapon.name: Toxic Bullets
weapon.description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

weapon.name: Alchemical Fire
weapon.description: Throw a flash that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team. Deals 40% less DPS vs non-heroes.

weapon.name: Heroic Aura
weapon.description: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions. Provides bonus Move Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.

weapon.name: Warp Stone
weapon.description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

weapon.name: Crippling Headshot
weapon.description: Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist.

weapon.name: Frenzy
weapon.description: While you are below 50% health, you gain stat bonuses. Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.
Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of 7 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

weapon.name: Lucky Shot
weapon.description: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal Bonus Weapon Damage and Slow on hit.

weapon.name: Ricochet
weapon.description: Your bullets will ricochet to enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

weapon.name: Silencer
weapon.description: Your bullets build up a Debuff that briefly Silences and reduces their Spirit Damage. Victims are immune to the build up for 12s after debuff expires.

weapon.name: Spiritual Overflow
weapon.description: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.

weapon.name: Shadow Weave
weapon.description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed. Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an Ambush, temporarily granting you Bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power.

weapon.name: Vampiric Burst
weapon.description: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.

vitality.name: Melee Lifesteal
vitality.description: Your melee attacks heal you for 18% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 90. This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.

vitality.name: Healing Rite
vitality.description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

vitality.name: Combat Barrier
vitality.description: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

vitality.name: Debuff Reducer
vitality.description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

vitality.name: Enchantress's Barrier
vitality.description: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

vitality.name: Enduring Speed
vitality.description: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.

vitality.name: Healbane
vitality.description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

vitality.name: Healing Booster
vitality.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 25% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by 15%.

vitality.name: Reactive Barrier
vitality.description: Automatically restore one stamina and deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

vitality.name: Divine Barrier
vitality.description: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Move Speed. Can be self-cast.

vitality.name: Healing Nova
vitality.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally.

vitality.name: Restorative Locket
vitality.description: When an enemy uses an ability within 50m range from you, store on Restoration Stack. Consume all stacks to heal a target ally and replenish a stamina point. Can be self-cast.

vitality.name: Return Fire
vitality.description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

vitality.name: Fortitude
vitality.description: After not taking damage for 10s, gain 4% Max Health Regen. When you are above 75%, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Move Speed.

vitality.name: Lifestrike
vitality.description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 55% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 110. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

vitality.name: Superior Stamina
vitality.description: Increases the number of Air Jump, Air Dashes and Wall Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2.

vitality.name: Majestic Leap
vitality.description: Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster. Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy hero.

vitality.name: Metal Skin
vitality.description: Become Immune to bullets.

vitality.name: Inhibitor
vitality.description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

vitality.name: Leech
vitality.description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

vitality.name: Siphon Bullets
vitality.description: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal 1 stacks of health if a siphoned target dies and lose 2 stacks if you die.

vitality.name: Veil Walker
vitality.description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Move Speed, and restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields.

vitality.name: Colossus
vitality.description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

vitality.name: Phantom Strike
vitality.description: Teleport to a nearby target, dealing damage and applying Disarm, Slow, and pulls them to the ground.

spirit.name: Ammo Scavenger
spirit.description: Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power. At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint Speed.

spirit.name: Mystic Burst
spirit.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit.

spirit.name: Spirit Strike
spirit.description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

spirit.name: Bullet Resist Shredder
spirit.description: Reduce Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

spirit.name: Quicksilver Reload
spirit.description: Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for thatt clip. Only activates if Ammo is not full.

spirit.name: Suppressor
spirit.description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

spirit.name: Cold Front
spirit.description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slow targets it hits. Deals 2x Damage to non-Heroes.

spirit.name: Decay
spirit.description: Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health. Decay's damage is non-lethal.

spirit.name: Slowing Hex
spirit.description: Deals Spirit Damage, Slows target movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.

spirit.name: Withering Whip
spirit.description: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

spirit.name: Arcane Surge
spirit.description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost and extra stamina and the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Additionally you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

spirit.name: Improved Burst
spirit.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 175 damage or more in a single hit. Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for 5s after taking damage from it.

spirit.name: Improved Reach
spirit.description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

spirit.name: Mystic Slow
spirit.description: When target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

spirit.name: Spirit Snatch
spirit.description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

spirit.name: Superior Cooldown
spirit.description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

spirit.name: Superior Duration
spirit.description: Increses the Duration of your abilities and items.

spirit.name: Surge of Power
spirit.description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.

spirit.name: Torment Pulse
spirit.description: Periodically deal Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

spirit.name: Ethereal Shift
spirit.description: You enter a void state and become Untangible and Invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform any actions. Afterwards you gain move speed, spirit, and spirit resist. Cancels any active ability.

spirit.name: Knockdown
spirit.description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action. Stun lasts up to 2x longer against airborne targets based on how high off the ground they are (up to 30m).

spirit.name: Silence Glyph
spirit.description: Fire a projectile that silences and damages the first enemy hero it hits. Silence does not interrupt chanelling abilities.

spirit.name: Diviner's Kevlar
spirit.description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

spirit.name: Escalating Exposure
spirit.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

spirit.name: Mystic Reverb
spirit.description: Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

spirit.name: Curse
spirit.description: Curse an enemy - Interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

spirit.name: Echo Shard
spirit.description: Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ulitmate ability.

spirit.name: Magic Carpet
spirit.description: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit Shields. Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

spirit.name: Refresher
spirit.description: reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.
